text: The TV host has always been an ally. | Photo : YouTube / The Late Late Show with James Corden Late night host James Corden has the best answer if his children ever ask him about gay relationships. They haven ’ t yet because gay people have always been a part of their lives. Corden opened up about their family life and raising his children to be accepting in an Attitude interview. ‘ They haven ’ t brought it up, but we have lots of gay friends – like our friends Chris and Mark – who have come over a lot and stayed with us, ’ he said. ‘ I think my son has never questioned it as it ’ s always been there. ’ Corden, who ’ s currently the host of The Late Late Show, has three children with his wife Julia Carey.
